meanings.definition: To fold or intertwine with one another.
meanings.sent1: The ribbons interfolds beautifully in the gift wrapping.
meanings.sent2: The branches of the trees interfolds in the dense forest.
meanings.sent3: The fabric interfolds like a dance between the threads.
meanings.sent4: The stories of the characters interfolds into a captivating narrative.
meanings.sent5: The flavors of the spices interfolds to create a delicious dish.

meanings.definition: To be folded or intertwined with each other.
meanings.sent1: The paper interfolds neatly in the origami art.
meanings.sent2: The blankets on the bed interfolds for warmth.
meanings.sent3: The roads interfolds like a maze in the city.
meanings.sent4: The melodies of the instruments interfolds into a harmonious symphony.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the rainbow interfolds beautifully in the sky.
